name: egeloen/serializer
description: Serializer for PHP 5.6+ supporting (JSON, XML, YAML)

suggest.doctrine/annotations: Allow you to use the mapping annotations.
suggest.ext-dom: Allow you to use the XML encoder, decoder and mapping.
suggest.ext-json: Allow you to use the JSON encoder and decoder.
suggest.symfony/property-access: Allow you to use the object normalizer and denormalizer.
suggest.symfony/property-info: Allow you to use the type auto discovery.
suggest.symfony/yaml: Allow you to use the YAML encoder, decoder and mapping.
